newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary Q1 construction output rises 7.7 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Hungary Q1 construction output rises 7.7 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Hungary's construction industry output rose by 7.7 percent in the first quarter of 1997 over the same period of 1996, seasonally adjusted figures of the Central Statistical Office (KSH) showed on Friday.
The output in the first quarter totalled 81.1 billion forints ($448 million) at current prices, the KSH said.
The output of the construction industry in March rose 9.9 percent year-and-year and dropped 4.2 percent month-on-month, according to seasonally adjusted figures, the KLSH added.
Hungary's total industry output in March increased 3.6 percent year-on-year and fell 8.6 percent month-on-month.
